description:
Grigorii Rasputin is a famous Russian mystic who once held a great influence over the Russian Imperial Court because of his ability to supposedly heal the Romanov`s hemophiliac heir, Alexei.
He now serves the http://anidb.net/ch81510 [Black King] as a spymaster for his army, and is often seen by http://anidb.net/ch81068 [Anastasia]`s side. Similar to the http://anidb.net/ch86428 [Octobrists], Rasputin uses magic to possess others via the use of talismans, which he also uses for communication among the Black King`s army.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Grigorii Rasputin
